content: In what ways can video games be utilized to manage anxiety disorders beyond the surface level? Can the immersive and engaging experience provided by video games not only offer a temporary distraction and relaxation but also help individuals with anxiety develop coping mechanisms? Additionally, could you demonstrate a more complex JSON data representation that includes further details on the patient's anxiety disorder and treatment plan, as well as more comprehensive outcome measures tracking not only anxiety levels but also potential improvements in other related areas such as social interaction and self-esteem?
